description: I have known Alexander Tsema for about two years since 2014. I worked as the Head of Automation Department for MAYKOR Company, St. Petersburg branch and Alexander reported to me in the position of Middle C# Developer. MAYKOR is a leading Russian provider of IT and business process outsourcing services with extensive network of branches and delivery centers across Russia. The Automation Department served companies from key sectors such as: retail, oil and gas, finance, telecommunications, manufacturing and the public sector.

We hired Alexander to develop our front end user interface to integrate with our virtual classroom for students. Alexander has proven to be an excellent front end developer with a unique attention to detail and quality. Alexander has gone on to develop not only the user interface but has developed a high quality proprietary system for our online language school. We will continue to work with him

We hired Alexander to develop from scratch a complete system administrator company wide portal to enable our back office to process and manage sensitive data for teachers, students and classes. Alexander was also hired to further enhance our virtual classroom front-end for students an application that he previously developed for us. Alexander has once again proven his unique ability to develop at

Excellent work! Easy to work overall. Alex's final product was great and easy for us to take over. He was clean in his delivery and willing to help all step of the way. Alexander is always on time with his work and will go extra time if it is necessary. No revision needed. excellent experience. I will work with Alexander again soon.
